description_en: Learn about NHS and self-funding options, managing direct payments, and other ways to pay for your care.
description_cy: Dysgwch am opsiynau GIG a hunan-ariannu, rheoli taliadau uniongyrchol, a ffyrdd eraill i dalu am eich gofal.

description_en: Find out about support available to carers and how to manage the money of someone you're caring for.
description_cy: Dysgwch am gymorth sydd ar gael i ofalwyr a sut i reoli arian rhywun yr ydych yn gofalu amdanynt.

description_cy: Cymorth ynghylch Taliad Annibyniaeth Bersonol, grantiau anabledd, cymhorthion a chyfarpar.

description_en: Work out how much you can afford to save and find out how to set and reach your savings goal.
description_cy: Cyfrifwch faint allwch fforddio ei gynilo a dysgwch sut i sefydlu a chyrraedd eich nod cynilo.

description_en: Learn about savings accounts, cash ISAs, and how to save for children.
description_cy: Dysgwch am gyfrifon cynilo, ISAs arian parod a sut i gynilo ar gyfer plant.

description_en: Learn about investing basics, how to make an investment plan, and understanding your attitude to risk.
description_cy: Dysgwch am hanfodion buddsoddi, sut i lunio cynllun buddsoddi, a deall eich agwedd tuag at risg.

description_en: Information about stocks and shares, investment bonds, tracker funds, with-profits and endowment policies.
description_cy: Gwybodaeth am stociau a chyfranddaliadau, bondiau buddsoddi, cronfeydd tracio, polisïau gydag-elw a gwaddol.

description_en: Work out your overall buying and moving costs, first time buyer advice, and tips and tools to help you work out what you can afford.
description_cy: Cyfrifwch eich costau prynu a symud cyffredinol, cyngor i brynwyr tro cyntaf, ac awgrymiadau ac offer i'ch helpu chi i gyfrifo beth allwch ei fforddio.

description_en: Get started with our beginner's guide to mortgages, getting the right deal, and tips if you're struggling to pay.
description_cy: Dechreuwch arno gyda'n canllaw dechreuwyr i forgeisi, cael y fargen gywir, ac awgrymiadau os ydych yn profi anawsterau wrth dalu.

description_en: Learn about different kinds of mortgages, from repayment and interest-only to shared equity and buy-to-let.
description_cy: Dysgwch am wahanol fathau o forgeisi, o ad-daliad a llog yn unig i ecwiti a rennir a phrynu-i-osod.

description_en: Advice to help you work out how much rent you can afford, and how to budget and share costs when renting.
description_cy: Cyngor i'ch helpu i gyfrifo faint o rent y gallwch chi fforddio, a sut i gyllidebu a rhannu costau wrth rentu.

description_en: Taking control of debt, getting free debt advice, and how to borrow affordably
description_cy: Cymryd rheolaeth dros ddyled, cael cyngor am ddim ar ddyledion, a sut i fenthyca'n fforddadwy

description_en: Find out if you need to borrow money and whether you can afford it. Learn how to work out the true cost of borrowing.
description_cy: Dysgwch a oes arnoch angen benthyca arian ac a allwch ei fforddio. Dysgwch sut i gyfrifo gwir gost benthyca.

description_en: Where to get free debt advice, how to speak to the people you owe money to, and tips to help you pay back your debts in the right order.
description_cy: Ble i fynd i gael cyngor rhad ac am ddim ar ddyledion, sut i siarad â'r bobl y mae arnoch arian iddynt, ac awgrymiadau i'ch helpu i ad-dalu'ch dyledion yn y drefn iawn.

description_en: Help if you're struggling with your mortgage or rent payments and information on government support if you can't pay your mortgage.
description_cy: Cymorth os ydych yn profi anawsterau gyda'ch taliadau morgais neu rent a gwybodaeth ar gymorth gan y llywodraeth os na allwch dalu'ch morgais.

description_en: Learn about how personal loans work, better alternatives to payday loans, and help when borrowing from a credit union.
description_cy: Dysgwch am sut mae benthyciadau personol yn gweithio, dewisiadau eraill gwell na benthyciadau diwrnod cyflog, a chymorth wrth fenthyca gan undeb credyd.

description_en: Find out how to manage a credit card, how to check your credit report, and tips on how you can improve your credit rating.
description_cy: Dysgwch sut i reoli cerdyn credyd, sut i wirio'ch adroddiad credyd, ac awgrymiadau ynghylch sut y gallwch wella'ch statws credyd.

description_en: Advice on running a bank account, planning your finances, and cutting costs
description_cy: Cyngor ar redeg cyfrif banc, cynllunio'ch arian, a thorri ar gostau

description_en: Find out how to manage a bank account, from paying money in to keeping track of interest and charges.
description_cy: Dysgwch sut i reoli cyfrif banc, o dalu arian i mewn i gadw llygad ar log a ffioedd.

description_en: See how you can make your money go further and use our Budget planner to discover how much cash you have coming in and what you're spending it on.
description_cy: Gwiriwch sut y gallwch wneud i'ch arian fynd ymhellach a defnyddiwch ein Cynllunyddcyllideb i weld faint o arian sydd gennych yn dod i mewn ac ar beth yr ydych yn ei wario.

description_en: Help with preparing your child for student life, including tips on budgeting at college or university.
description_cy: Cymorth gyda pharatoi eich plentyn ar gyfer bywyd myfyrwyr, gan gynnwys awgrymiadau ar gyllidebu yn y coleg neu'r brifysgol.

description_en: Help with trimming your energy, home phone and broadband bills, and tips on getting holidays for less.
description_cy: Cymorth gyda thorri'ch biliau ynni, ffôn cartref a band eang, ac awgrymiadau ynghylch cael gwyliau am lai o arian.

description_en: Having a baby, making a will, and dealing with divorce and separation
description_cy: Cael babi, gwneud ewyllys, ac ymdrin ag ysgaru a gwahanu

description_en: Help with managing your money before, during and after the birth of your baby.
description_cy: Cymorth gyda rheoli eich arian cyn, yn ystod ac ar ôl genedigaeth eich babi.

description_en: Find out how to claim maternity pay and leave from your employer and your rights when returning to work.
description_cy: Dysgwch sut i hawlio tâl ac absenoldeb mamolaeth gan eich cyflogwr a'ch hawliau wrth ddychwelyd i'r gwaith.

description_en: Learn how to make and change a will and find out about the different options available.
description_cy: Dysgwch sut i wneud a newid ewyllys a dysgu am y gwahanol opsiynau sydd ar gael.

description_en: Learn how to deal with money after a death, from paying for the funeral to looking after the paperwork and household bills.
description_cy: Dysgwch sut i ddelio ag arian ar ôl i rywun farw, o dalu am yr angladd i ofalu am y gwaith papur a biliau'r cartref.

description_en: Find out how to manage your money and divide up what you own when going through divorce or separation.
description_cy: Dysgwch sut i reoli'ch arian a rhannu'r hyn rydych yn berchen arno wrth fynd trwy ysgariad neu ymwahaniad.

description_en: Help with buying, running and selling a car, buying foreign currency, and sending money abroad
description_cy: Cymorth i brynu, rhedeg a gwerthu car, prynu arian tramor, ac anfon arian dramor

description_en: What to consider before buying a new or used car, including your budget, car finance options, and how to negotiate the best deal.
description_cy: Beth i'w ystyried cyn prynu car newydd neu ail-law, gan gynnwys eich cyllideb, opsiynau cyllid car, a sut i gael y fargen orau.

description_en: Your rights if something’s wrong with your new car, cutting car finance costs, top MOT tips, advice for younger drivers, plus could you manage without a car?
description_cy: Eich hawliau os oes problem gyda'ch car newydd, torri costau cyllid car, awgrymiadau defnyddiol am yr MOT, cyngor ar gyfer gyrwyr iau, ac a allech ymdopi heb gar?

description_en: Find out about the different ways to sell a car, how to negotiate a good price, and your options for disposing of an old car.
description_cy: Dysgwch am y gwahanol ffyrdd o werthu car, sut i gael pris da, a'ch opsiynau i gael gwared ar hen gar.

title_en: Travel money and sending money abroad
title_cy: Arian teithio ac anfon arian dramor
description_en: Buying foreign currency, cheap cards to use abroad, and choosing the best way to send money overseas.
description_cy: Prynu arian tramor, cardiau rhad i'w defnyddio dramor a dewis y ffordd orau o anfon arian dramor.

description_en: Includes retirement advice, types of pension and retirement income, and information on automatic enrolment
description_cy: Yn cynnwys cyngor ar ymddeol, mathau o bensiwn ac incwm ymddeol, a gwybodaeth ar gofrestru awtomatig

description_en: Help with understanding your payslip and what to look for in your employment contract.
description_cy: Cymorth gyda deall eich slip cyflog a beth i edrych amdano yn eich cytundeb cyflogaeth.

description_en: Help with making a redundancy plan, benefits you can claim, and your legal rights.
description_cy: Cymorth gyda llunio cynllun dileu swydd, budd-daliadau y gallwch eu hawlio, a’ch hawliau cyfreithiol.

description_en: Find out why and when to save into a pension and how to work out what your pension pot might be.
description_cy: Dysgwch pam a phryd i gynilo i bensiwn a sut i gyfrifo faint fydd eich cronfa bensiwn.

description_en: From defined contribution and benefit schemes, to personal pensions and pensions for the self-employed.
description_cy: O gynlluniau cyfraniad diffiniedig a buddion, i bensiynau personol a phensiynau ar gyfer pobl hunangyflogedig.

description_en: Learn about automatic enrolment and how it affects you, and use our workplace pension advice tool and calculator.
description_cy: Dysgwch am gofrestru awtomatig a sut mae’n effeithio arnoch, a defnyddiwch ein hofferyn a chyfrifiannell cyngor pensiwn gweithle.

description_en: Setting a clear retirement income goal and managing your money once you’ve stopped working.
description_cy: Gosod nod incwm ymddeol a rheoli’ch arian ar ôl ichi orffen gweithio.

description_en: Learn about the different types of annuity and other types of pension and retirement income.
description_cy: Darllenwch am y gwahanol fathau o flwydd-dal a mathau eraill o bensiwn ac incwm ymddeol.
